description.en: When you take a short rest, you can choose a long rest move instead of a short rest move.
description.ru: When you take a short rest, you can choose a long rest move instead of a short rest move.

description.en: When you would take Severe damage, you can mark a Stress to mark 1 fewer Hit Points.
description.ru: When you would take Severe damage, you can mark a Stress to mark 1 fewer Hit Points.

description.en: Choose an element for your breath. You can use this breath against a target or group of targets within Very Close range, treating it as an Instinct weapon that deals d8 magic damage using your Proficiency.
description.ru: Choose an element for your breath. You can use this breath against a target or group of targets within Very Close range, treating it as an Instinct weapon that deals d8 magic damage using your Proficiency.

description.en: When you take Minor damage, you can mark 2 Stress instead of marking a Hit Point.
description.ru: When you take Minor damage, you can mark 2 Stress instead of marking a Hit Point.

description.en: Spend 3 Hope to halve incoming physical damage.
description.ru: Spend 3 Hope to halve incoming physical damage.

description.en: Mark a Stress to gain advantage on a reaction roll.
description.ru: Mark a Stress to gain advantage on a reaction roll.

description.en: During a rest, you can drop into a trance to choose an additional downtime move.
description.ru: During a rest, you can drop into a trance to choose an additional downtime move.

description.en: After you or a willing ally within Close range makes an action roll, you can spend 3 Hope to reroll the Duality Dice.
description.ru: After you or a willing ally within Close range makes an action roll, you can spend 3 Hope to reroll the Duality Dice.

description.en: You can fly. While flying, you can mark a Stress after an adversary makes an attack against you to gain a +2 bonus to your Evasion against that attack.
description.ru: You can fly. While flying, you can mark a Stress after an adversary makes an attack against you to gain a +2 bonus to your Evasion against that attack.

description.en: You can leap anywhere within Close range as though you were using normal movement, allowing you to vault obstacles, jump across gaps, or scale barriers with ease.
description.ru: You can leap anywhere within Close range as though you were using normal movement, allowing you to vault obstacles, jump across gaps, or scale barriers with ease.

description.en: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to kick yourself off them, dealing an extra 2d6 damage and knocking back either yourself or the target to Very Close range.
description.ru: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to kick yourself off them, dealing an extra 2d6 damage and knocking back either yourself or the target to Very Close range.

description.en: When you succeed on an Agility Roll to move from Far or Very Far range into Melee range with one or more targets, you can mark a Stress to deal 1d12 physical damage to all targets within Melee range.
description.ru: When you succeed on an Agility Roll to move from Far or Very Far range into Melee range with one or more targets, you can mark a Stress to deal 1d12 physical damage to all targets within Melee range.

description.en: When you would mark a Stress, roll a d6. On a result of 6, don't mark it.
description.ru: When you would mark a Stress, roll a d6. On a result of 6, don't mark it.

description.en: Make an Instinct Roll (12) to use your mycelial array to speak with others of your ancestry. On a success, you can communicate across any distance.
description.ru: Make an Instinct Roll (12) to use your mycelial array to speak with others of your ancestry. On a success, you can communicate across any distance.

description.en: While touching a corpse that died recently, you can mark a Stress to extract one memory from the corpse related to a specific emotion or sensation of your choice.
description.ru: While touching a corpse that died recently, you can mark a Stress to extract one memory from the corpse related to a specific emotion or sensation of your choice.

description.en: Treat any weapon, ability, spell, or other feature that has a Melee range as though it has a Very Close range instead.
description.ru: Treat any weapon, ability, spell, or other feature that has a Melee range as though it has a Very Close range instead.

description.en: You ignore disadvantage on Agility Rolls.
description.ru: You ignore disadvantage on Agility Rolls.

description.en: Mark a Stress to force an adversary to reroll an attack against you or an ally within Very Close range.
description.ru: Mark a Stress to force an adversary to reroll an attack against you or an ally within Very Close range.

description.en: At the start of each session, everyone in your party gains a Hope.
description.ru: At the start of each session, everyone in your party gains a Hope.

description.en: When you roll a 1 on your Hope Die, you can reroll it.
description.ru: When you roll a 1 on your Hope Die, you can reroll it.

description.en: When you fail a roll that utilized one of your Experiences, you can mark a Stress to reroll.
description.ru: When you fail a roll that utilized one of your Experiences, you can mark a Stress to reroll.

description.en: When you roll with Fear, you can mark 2 Stress to change it into a roll with Hope instead.
description.ru: When you roll with Fear, you can mark 2 Stress to change it into a roll with Hope instead.

description.en: You have advantage on rolls to intimidate hostile creatures.
description.ru: You have advantage on rolls to intimidate hostile creatures.

description.en: When you make an Agility Roll, you can spend 2 Hope to reroll your Hope Die.
description.ru: When you make an Agility Roll, you can spend 2 Hope to reroll your Hope Die.

description.en: Make an Agility Roll to scratch a target within Melee range. On a success, they become temporarily Vulnerable.
description.ru: Make an Agility Roll to scratch a target within Melee range. On a success, they become temporarily Vulnerable.

description.en: When you have 1 Hit Point remaining, attacks against you have disadvantage.
description.ru: When you have 1 Hit Point remaining, attacks against you have disadvantage.

description.en: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can spend a Hope to gore the target with your tusks, dealing an extra 1d6 damage.
description.ru: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can spend a Hope to gore the target with your tusks, dealing an extra 1d6 damage.

description.en: You can breathe and move naturally underwater.
description.ru: You can breathe and move naturally underwater.

description.en: You can use your long tongue to grab onto things within Close range. Mark a Stress to use your tongue as a Finesse Close weapon that deals d12 physical damage using your Proficiency.
description.ru: You can use your long tongue to grab onto things within Close range. Mark a Stress to use your tongue as a Finesse Close weapon that deals d12 physical damage using your Proficiency.

description.en: You have advantage on Agility Rolls that involve balancing and climbing.
description.ru: You have advantage on Agility Rolls that involve balancing and climbing.
